comments:
Description:
DataException is thrown when run attached file.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run attached file on_create.xml

Expected result:
No Exception

Result:
SEVERE: Invalid expression handle
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Invalid expression handle

Failed to check this issue for the lack of includescript-create-render.js file.

I cannot receive the original exception, instead, the following exception will
be thrown out now:

2005-11-17 10:25:09 org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine evaluate
严重: Result iterator has no current row. It either has not started or has ended.

2005-11-17 10:28:24 org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.data.dte.DteDataEngine evaluate

The last exception has been fixed.

The script evaluation exception is caused by wrong variable reference. The "a"
is create in onCreate event and used in value expression.

<data> 
<property name="display">inline</property>
<method name="onCreate"><![CDATA[var a="on-create in list-data"; a;]]></method>
<expression name="valueExpr">a=a+row.OrderID;a;</expression>
</data>
<data name="data24">
<method name="onCreate"><![CDATA[var a="on-create in table-data "; a;]]></method>
<expression name="valueExpr">a=a+row.BillToAddress;a;</expression>
</data>

traces.message: Result iterator has no current row. It either has not started or has ended.
